title: "Players can no longer get stuck in weird states (ex. every button is a ping)"
body:
Mmmm. No its just even time you tab now.

EDIT: Obviously needs context.

>Patch 6.17 bugfix: Players can no longer get stuck in weird states (ex. every button is a ping) if they switch to a different window at the exact moment they input a command

Tabbing while doing a command will be the initial trigger(still) for your video setting being switched to windowed mode, it also locks the cam so you cant scroll down, as well as making every (left) click a ping, then after its happened once, even without the "trigger" of tabbing just as you input a command, it will lock the screen out from scrolling down, change it to windowed and make clicks pings.

TDLR(for the super lazy): After triggering the bug once, (every time you tab out of the game to check things (like the time)) you get that bug.

**For the even lazier: **That bug wasn't fixed, it just became worse

Flying cameras are usually a mouse related issue. Dust in the optics, etc. You want rito to come clean your mouse for you?
Also, a thing to remember, don't use a wireless mouse for gaming. Batteries die mid game and tears are shed.

The problem seems to be  the supposed "bug fix" which just made that bug worse, as in added feature of changing screen to windowed and locking downward movement

haha no I mean the screen kept going unlocked when it was locked and without me pressing y. I ended up playing the entire rest of the game just leaving it unlocked camera and I didn't encounter any more problems and in subsequent games the issue did not reoccur.

or sometimes the camera will randomly unlock or relock and I know I shouldn't be using locked camera at all and I'm trying to wean myself off it but it still screws with you when you're trying to focus on some mechanical play and then suddenly your screen flies away to the toplane bushes and you'll like... ok nevermind.

I've heard alot of people complaining about these sorts of spotty things popping up but they don't seem to be consistent or recreatable. I'm sure they'll be worked out soon though since alot of people are complaining about it.
so sometimes the camera jsut goes crazy then tries to lock itself and you cant unlock it, but if you click nd drag on the mimimap it unlocks, the only other way to unlock it is to die
